title: Reaver

***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Reavers have an assortment of powerful, but highly situational, conjurations to draw upon when their skill in melee is insufficient. They start with a simple weapon of their choice and leather armour. |

**Reavers** are warriors who learn [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") (destructive magic) in order to complement their deadliness in combat.

## Contents

- [1 Preferred Species](#Preferred_Species)
- [2 Starting Equipment](#Starting_Equipment)
  - [2.1 Available Spells](#Available_Spells)
- [3 Starting Skills](#Starting_Skills)
- [4 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [4.1 Spell Details](#Spell_Details)
- [5 History](#History)

## Preferred Species

[Gnoll](/Gnoll "Gnoll"), [Tengu](/Tengu "Tengu"), [Barachi](/Barachi "Barachi"), [Demonspawn](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn"), [Draconian](/Draconian "Draconian"), and [Hill Orc](/Hill_Orc "Hill Orc") are the recommended species if you pick a Reaver Background.

## Starting Equipment

Some [species](/Species "Species") may receive different items based on their unique restrictions.

- +0 [weapon of choice](/Weapon_of_choice "Weapon of choice") ([short sword](/Short_sword "Short sword"), [hand axe](/Hand_axe "Hand axe"), [spear](/Spear "Spear"), [falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") or [mace](/Mace "Mace"))
- +0 [leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour")

### Available Spells

- [Kiss of Death](/Kiss_of_Death "Kiss of Death")
- [Momentum Strike](/Momentum_Strike "Momentum Strike")
- [Hailstorm](/Hailstorm "Hailstorm")

Reavers start with the [Kiss of Death](/Kiss_of_Death "Kiss of Death") spell memorised.

## Starting Skills

These are adjusted by your species' [aptitudes](/Aptitude "Aptitude").

- [Fighting](/Fighting "Fighting"): 2
- Chosen Weapon's Skill: 3
- [Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging"): 2
- [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting"): 2
- [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"): 3

Choosing Reaver adds 4 to your starting [Strength](/Strength "Strength"), 5 to [Intelligence](/Intelligence "Intelligence"), and 3 to [Dexterity](/Dexterity "Dexterity").

## Strategy

Reavers should be treated as melee warriors, with a little extra power from their set of spells. Their spells have a theme: limited use, but powerful.

Reaver is a flexible background. If you've found a set of [plate armour](/Plate_armour "Plate armour"), don't be afraid to rely entirely on melee for a while. If you've found a [Book of Conjurations](/Book_of_Conjurations "Book of Conjurations"), then you have a path towards general spellcasting. Being a "pure hybrid" isn't always possible; some characters will spend the rest of the game focusing on melee or magic.

### Spell Details

[Kiss of Death](/Kiss_of_Death "Kiss of Death") should be thought of as a consumable, like [Brigand](/Brigand "Brigand")'s darts or [Gladiator](/Gladiator "Gladiator")'s [throwing nets](/Throwing_net "Throwing net"). It deals extreme damage for its level and ignores [EV](/EV "EV"). However, it [drains](/Drain "Drain") a good chunk of your max HP (temporarily). You can cure draining by killing monsters. You should use Kiss of Death sparingly, but it can be a strong option against early [gnolls](/Gnoll_\(monster\) "Gnoll (monster)"), [adders](/Adder "Adder"), and other scary monsters. Past D:4 or so, this spell becomes too weak to deal with dangerous threats. Training 1-2 levels of Necromancy skill, in addition to Conjurations, can be worthwhile.

[Momentum Strike](/Momentum_Strike "Momentum Strike"), like Kiss of Death, is not a main source of damage. It deals relatively high damage, but if you hit, *you are prevented from moving* for a few turns. And if you can't move, you can't cast this spell (e.g. it has a cooldown). Position yourself in a hallway or other advantageous position before casting this spell. Due to its casting limitations, Momentum Strike is closer to a support spell than an actual killing tool.

[Hailstorm](/Hailstorm "Hailstorm") doesn't harm the player for using it, but with a range of 2-3, it is a very awkward spell to use. Most characters are limited to 1-2 casts before an enemy gets into melee range. Depending on the character and dungeon loot, it might not be worth it to train Conjurations up to Hailstorm at all.

## History

- The Reaver background was reintroduced in [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), with an entirely new set of spells.

- Reaver was removed in version [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"). This version could start with the [Book of Conjurations](/Book_of_Conjurations "Book of Conjurations") (Ice) or [Book of Conjurations (Fire)](/Book_of_Conjurations_\(fire%2Bearth\) "Book of Conjurations (fire+earth)").

  - Ice contained [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart"), [Throw Frost](/Throw_Frost "Throw Frost"), [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud"), [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt"), [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold"), and [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud")
  - Fire contained [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart"), [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame"), [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow"), [Conjure Flame](/Conjure_Flame "Conjure Flame"), [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma"), and [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire").

  • +0 leather armour

  • Kiss of Death
  • Momentum Strike
  • Hailstorm
